name: Djamarsa

skills.name: Night's Finger
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn. If Crohnam is on the same team, and the [Sleep] debuff was resisted or blocked, place a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff instead for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be blocked.

effects.notes: CONDITIONAL: If Crohnam is on team and Sleep is resisted/blocked, place Dec SPD instead (CANNOT BE BLOCKED)

skills.book_value: Moderate - increases Sleep chance from 30% to 50%, improving CC consistency
skills.notes: CROHNAM SYNERGY: If Sleep is resisted/blocked with Crohnam on team, automatically places Dec SPD (30%, 2 turns) that CANNOT BE BLOCKED. This makes Djamarsa + Crohnam a reliable CC/debuff combo.

skills.name: Radiant Moon
skills.description: Heals a target ally by 50% of their MAX HP and fills their Turn Meter by 30%. If this skill is used on Crohnam, he will instantly activate his Berserker's Delight Skill.

effects.notes: CONDITIONAL: If used on Crohnam, he instantly activates his A3 (Berserker's Delight) - unique skill activation synergy

skills.book_value: High - reduces cooldown from 4 to 3 turns, increases heal from 30% to 50% MAX HP. Critical for sustain and TM boost uptime.
skills.notes: PRIMARY SUPPORT SKILL. Huge heal (50% MAX HP booked) + TM boost (30%) on target ally. CROHNAM SYNERGY: Using this on Crohnam instantly triggers his A3 (Berserker's Delight), allowing for extra damage and control cycling. Pair Djamarsa + Crohnam for powerful heal + instant nuke combo.

skills.name: Moonlit March
skills.description: Revives all dead allies with 30% HP and 30% Turn Meter

effects.notes: Revives ALL dead allies with 30% HP and 30% TM

skills.book_value: High - reduces cooldown from 7 to 5 turns, significantly improving team survivability and revive frequency
skills.notes: TEAM REVIVE SKILL. Revives ALL dead allies (not just 1) with 30% HP and 30% TM. Extremely valuable for Doom Tower, Faction Wars, and Arena defense. 5-turn cooldown (booked) is fast for a team revive. Can turn losing fights around if timed correctly.

skills.name: Phasing
skills.description: Whenever an ally uses an Active Skill, has a 20% chance of decreasing the cooldown of that skill by 1 turn

effects.notes: 20% chance per ally skill use to reduce that skill's cooldown by 1 turn. Passive has 0-turn cooldown when booked (always active).

skills.book_value: High - reduces passive cooldown from 3 to 0 turns, making it ALWAYS ACTIVE. Massive value for cycling team skills faster.
skills.notes: PASSIVE COOLDOWN REDUCTION. 20% chance to reduce cooldown of ANY ally active skill by 1 turn. BOOKS ARE CRITICAL: Passive cooldown goes from 3 turns to 0 turns when fully booked, making it always active. This effectively increases team skill cycling by ~20%, very powerful with high-impact skills (revives, nukes, debuffs).

forms.aura: Increase Ally C. DMG in Faction Crypts by 23%
forms.comments: Djamarsa is a unique support champion with Crohnam synergy and team-wide cooldown reduction. Her A3 team revive is rare and valuable for hard content. Her passive (when booked) provides 20% chance to reduce any ally skill cooldown, effectively speeding up the entire team. Pair with Crohnam for Sleep/Dec SPD combo (A1) and instant Berserker's Delight activation (A2). Excellent in Faction Wars, Doom Tower, and Arena defense.

stat_priorities: 180+ SPD (for faster cycling and support actions)
High HP% (for survivability, no scaling on heals/revive)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 180+ SPD, 150+ ACC (Sleep on Stun target), HP% for survivability - low priority (limited CB value)
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 200+ SPD, 100+ ACC, HP% chestplate, focus on fast cycling for heals/revive
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: 180+ SPD, 150+ ACC, high HP% and RES (150+) for boss floors, team revive is critical
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 200+ SPD, 150+ RES (defense), HP% for survivability, use as reviver or Crohnam support
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 180+ SPD, 100+ ACC, HP% and DEF% for survivability, team revive + passive cooldown reduction = high value

recommended_gear: Speed + Perception (fast cycling + ACC for Sleep)
Prioritize: 180+ SPD, HP% chestplate, HP% gloves, SPD boots, ACC for Sleep consistency

clan_boss: Warmaster (Offense T6 - damage contribution, though limited)
Cycle of Magic (Support T5 - cooldown reduction on A2/A3)
dungeons: Rapid Response (Defense T4 - +18% TM when ally receives crit, faster cycling)
doom_tower: Lasting Gifts (Support T5 - extends Sleep debuff duration)
Unshakeable (Defense T5 - -30% debuff duration for survivability)

blessings.best: Cruelty (Offense) - extends Sleep/Dec SPD debuff duration
alternatives: Survival Instinct (Life) - survivability boost for reviver
Ward of the Fallen (Life) - team damage reduction when Djamarsa is alive

mechanics_advisory.cheese_strategy: Team Revive Loop - use with other revivers (Scyl, Rector Drath) to create revive chain. Passive cooldown reduction speeds up revive cycling.
mechanics_advisory.ai_quirks: AI uses A3 revive intelligently when 2+ allies are dead. A2 prioritizes low HP allies. Passive triggers automatically. AI will use A2 on Crohnam if both are on team.
mechanics_advisory.general_strategy: SUPPORT + REVIVER WITH CROHNAM SYNERGY: Djamarsa excels as a healer, reviver, and team skill accelerator. Her passive (booked to 0 CD) provides 20% cooldown reduction on all ally skills, speeding up the entire team. Pair with Crohnam for unique synergies: A1 Sleep → Dec SPD fallback (cannot be blocked), A2 on Crohnam = instant Berserker's Delight activation. Team revive (A3) is rare and valuable for hard content. HIGH PRIORITY FOR USER: Aligns with Priority 3 (Doom Tower - team revive), Priority 5 (Faction Wars - Demonspawn), and Arena defense. Fully book her passive (3→0 CD) for maximum value.
